snippet: The authorities claim that a pharmacy chain is trying to destabilize the economy by allowing a long line to form outside one of its stores.
abstract: Venezuelan authorities file charges against two Farmatodo pharmacy chain executives, accusing them of economic sabotage.
lead_paragraph: The authorities claim that a pharmacy chain is trying to destabilize the economy by allowing a long line to form outside one of its stores.

headline.main: Venezuela Files Charges Accusing Pharmacy Executives of Economic Sabotage
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: 2 Charged Over a Long Line
